entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:17 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:17 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
